cnd6:2.1: Kodha santusito loketi ko loke tuttho santuttho attamano paripunnasankappoti—
cnd6:3.2: Iccati padasandhi padasamsaggo padaparipuri akkharasamavayo byanjanasilitthata padanupubbatapetam—
cnd6:3.6: Tissoti tassa brahmanassa namam sankha samanna pannatti voharo namam namakammam namadheyyam nirutti byanjanam abhilapo.
cnd6:3.7: Metteyyoti tassa brahmanassa gottam sankha samanna pannatti voharoti—
cnd6:4.1: Kassa no santi injitati tanhinjitam ditthinjitam maninjitam kilesinjitam kaminjitam.
cnd6:4.2: Kassime injita natthi na santi na samvijjanti nupalabbhanti pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddhati—
cnd6:5.1: Ko ubhantamabhinnayati ko ubho ante abhinnaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katvati—
cnd6:6.1: Majjhe manta na lippatiti majjhe mantaya na lippati, alitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
cnd6:7.1: Kam brusi mahapurisoti mahapuriso aggapuriso setthapuriso visetthapuriso pamokkhapuriso uttamapuriso padhanapuriso pavarapurisoti.
cnd6:7.2: Kam brusi kam kathesi kam mannasi kam bhanasi kam passati kam voharasiti—
cnd6:8.1: Ko idha sibbinimaccagati ko idha sibbinim tanham ajjhaga upaccaga atikkanto samatikkanto vitivattoti—
cnd6:11.6: Brahmacariyam vuccati asaddhammasamapattiya arati virati pativirati veramani akiriya akaranam anajjhapatti velaanatikkamo.
cnd6:11.7: Api ca nippariyayena brahmacariyam vuccati ariyo atthangiko maggo, seyyathidam—
cnd6:11.8: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi.
cnd6:11.9: Yo imina ariyena atthangikena maggena upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannagato, so vuccati brahmacariyava.
cnd6:11.10: Yatha ca dhanena dhanavati vuccati, bhogena bhogavati vuccati, yasena yasavati vuccati, sippena sippavati vuccati, silena silavati vuccati, viriyena viriyavati vuccati, pannaya pannavati vuccati, vijjaya vijjavati vuccati—
cnd6:11.11: evameva yo imina ariyena atthangikena maggena upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannagato, so vuccati brahmacariyavati—
cnd6:13.3: Yassesa tanha pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddha, so vuccati vitatanho cattatanho vantatanho muttatanho pahinatanho patinissatthatanho vitarago cattarago vantarago muttarago pahinarago patinissattharago nicchato nibbuto sitibhuto sukhappatisamvedi brahmabhutena attana viharati.
cnd6:13.4: Sadati sada sabbada sabbakalam niccakalam dhuvakalam satatam samitam abbokinnam ponkhanuponkham udakumikajatam avici santati sahitam phassitam purebhattam pacchabhattam purimayamam majjhimayamam pacchimayamam kale junhe vasse hemante gimhe purime vayokhandhe majjhime vayokhandhe pacchime vayokhandhe.
cnd6:13.7: vedanasu vedananupassanasatipatthanam bhavento sato, citte cittanupassanasatipatthanam bhavento sato, dhammesu dhammanupassanasatipatthanam bhavento sato …pe…
cnd6:14.2: Ya panna pajanana vicayo pavicayo …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammaditthi.
cnd6:14.3: Sankhayati sankhaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva, “sabbe sankhara anicca”ti sankhaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva,
cnd6:14.5: “yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti sankhaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
cnd6:15.1: Atha va aniccato sankhaya janitva … dukkhato … rogato … gandato … sallato …pe… nissaranato sankhaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
cnd6:15.2: Nibbutoti ragassa nibbapitatta nibbuto, dosassa nibbapitatta nibbuto, mohassa nibbapitatta nibbuto, kodhassa … upanahassa … makkhassa … palasassa … issaya … macchariyassa … mayaya … satheyyassa … thambhassa … sarambhassa … manassa … atimanassa … madassa … pamadassa … sabbakilesanam … sabbaduccaritanam … sabbadarathanam … sabbaparilahanam … sabbasantapanam … sabbakusalabhisankharanam nibbapitatta nibbuto.
cnd6:15.3: Bhikkhuti sattannam dhammanam bhinnatta bhikkhu …pe… vusitava khinapunabbhavo sa bhikkhuti—
cnd6:16.4: Tassime injita natthi na santi na samvijjanti nupalabbhanti pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddhati—
cnd6:19.2: Antati phasso eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, phassanirodho majjhe;
cnd6:19.3: atitam eko anto, anagatam dutiyo anto, paccuppannam majjhe;
cnd6:19.4: sukha vedana eko anto, dukkha vedana dutiyo anto, adukkhamasukha vedana majjhe;
cnd6:19.5: namam eko anto, rupam dutiyo anto, vinnanam majjhe;
cnd6:19.6: cha ajjhattikani ayatanani eko anto, cha bahirani ayatanani dutiyo anto, vinnanam majjhe;
cnd6:19.7: sakkayo eko anto, sakkayasamudayo dutiyo anto, sakkayanirodho majjhe.
cnd6:19.8: Manta vuccati panna, ya panna pajanana …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammaditthi.
cnd6:20.4: Yavata tanhasankhatena simakatam odhikatam pariyantakatam pariggahitam mamayitam—
cnd6:20.5: “idam mama, etam mama, ettakam mama, ettavata mama rupa sadda gandha rasa photthabba attharana pavurana dasidasa ajelaka kukkutasukara hatthigavassavalava khettam vatthu hirannam suvannam gamanigamarajadhaniyo ratthanca janapado ca koso ca kotthagaranca”.
cnd6:21.2: Visativatthuka sakkayaditthi, dasavatthuka micchaditthi, dasavatthuka antaggahika ditthi, ya evarupa ditthi ditthigatam ditthigahanam ditthikantaro ditthivisukayikam ditthivipphanditam ditthisamyojanam gaho patiggaho abhiniveso paramaso kummaggo micchapatho micchattam titthayatanam vipariyesaggaho viparitaggaho vipallasaggaho micchagaho ayathavakasmim yathavakanti gaho, yavata dvasatthi ditthigatani—
cnd6:22.1: So ubhantamabhinnaya, majjhe manta na lippatiti so ubho ca ante majjhanca mantaya abhinnaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva na lippati na palippati na upalippati, alitto asamlitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
cnd6:22.2: so ubhantamabhinnaya majjhe manta na lippati.
cnd6:23.1: Tam brumi mahapurisoti mahapuriso aggapuriso setthapuriso visetthapuriso pamokkhapuriso uttamapuriso padhanapuriso pavarapuriso, tam brumi tam kathemi tam bhanami tam dipemi tam voharami.
cnd6:24.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, mahapuriso hoti”ti?
cnd6:24.4: “Vimuttacittatta khvaham, sariputta, mahapurisoti vadami, avimuttacittatta no mahapurisoti vadami.
cnd6:25.2: Idha, sariputta, bhikkhu ajjhattam kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
cnd6:25.3: Tassa kaye kayanupassino viharato cittam virajjati vimuccati anupadaya asavehi.
cnd6:25.6: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
cnd6:25.7: Tassa dhammesu dhammanupassino viharato cittam virajjati vimuccati anupadaya asavehi.
cnd6:25.8: Evam kho, sariputta, bhikkhu vimuttacitto hoti.
cnd6:25.9: Vimuttacittatta khvaham, sariputta, mahapurisoti vadami, avimuttacittatta no mahapurisoti vadami”ti—
cnd6:26.2: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam, yassesa sibbini tanha pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddha.
cnd6:26.3: So sibbinim tanham accaga upaccaga atikkanto samatikkanto vitivattoti—
cnd6:28.1: Saha gathapariyosana ye te brahmanena saddhim ekacchanda ekapayoga ekadhippaya ekavasanavasita, tesam anekapanasahassanam virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum udapadi—
cnd6:28.3: Tassa brahmanassa anupadaya asavehi cittam vimucci.
cnd6:28.4: Saha arahattappatta ajinajatavakaciratidandakamandalukesa ca massu ca antarahita.
cnd6:28.5: Bhandukasayavatthavasano sanghatipattacivaradharo anvatthapatipattiya panjaliko bhagavantam namassamano nisinno hoti—
